column4: as i know,ubuntu works faster then windows, but i installed netbeans and it is working very slow, but in windows it works faster. Wy is so?
as i know,ubuntu works faster then windows, but i installed netbeans and it is working very slow, but in windows it works faster. Why it's so?
it's not because of Windows or Ubuntu but because of the Java-package you installed
64-bit is not for speed but for 4GB of memory and more
